casebody.data:
In the Matter of The J. T. ROBERTSON COMPANY, Inc., Bankrupt. BENTLEY, SETTLE & CO., Inc., et al., Appellants, v. FIRST TRUST & DEPOSIT CO., Appellee. No. 217. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 6, 1939. Costello, Cooney & Fearon and Laurence Sovik, all of Syracuse, N. Y., for creditor-appellants. Cregg, Brazell & Del Vecchio, of Syracuse, N. Y., for trustee-appellant. Hiscock, Cowie, Bruce & Lee, and Gerald H. Henley, all of Syracuse, N. Y., for appellees.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order, 26 F.Supp. 870, affirmed. '
